Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Jackson
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Central, Harrison, Laramie, Jackson, and Central due to police activity near Central/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Harrison, Laramie, Jackson, and resume normal route on Central due to police activity near Central/Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.
